pages.text: $(item)Resonate Ooze$() is, well, the residue of $(marked)phantasmal organisms$(), made visible and material through $(l:miskatonicmysteries:physics/resonator)$(item)the Resonator$(). This ooze of paranormal consistency can be used in $(marked)Potion Brewing$(), creating a potion with effects similar to that of the Resonator, albeit weaker and limited to whoever consumes it.
Resonate Ooze is still a subject of intense research. Most scientists assume that it has plenty of uses outside of $(o)conventional science$().
